mapper.update: update device_info set visit_time=#{visitTime} where dev_id = #{devId}
mapper.select: select dev_id, branch_id, branch_name, ip, visit_time, create_time, retain1, retain2, retain3, retain4, retain5, retain6, retain7, retain8, retain9, retain10, id from device_info where dev_id = #{devId}
select dev_id, branch_id, branch_name, ip, visit_time, create_time, retain1, retain2, retain3, retain4, retain5, retain6, retain7, retain8, retain9, retain10, id from device_info where id = #{id}
select visit_time from device_info where dev_id=#{devId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into device_info(dev_id, branch_id, branch_name, ip, visit_time, create_time, retain1, retain2, retain3, retain4, retain5, retain6, retain7, retain8, retain9, retain10) values (#{devId}, #{branchId}, #{branchName}, #{ip}, #{visitTime}, #{createTime}, #{retain1}, #{retain2}, #{retain3}, #{retain4}, #{retain5}, #{retain6}, #{retain7}, #{retain8}, #{retain9}, #{retain10})

insert into device_info(dev_id, branch_id, branch_name, ip, visit_time, create_time, retain1, retain2, retain3, retain4, retain5, retain6, retain7, retain8, retain9, retain10) values
(#{entity.devId}, #{entity.branchId}, #{entity.branchName}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.visitTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.retain1}, #{entity.retain2}, #{entity.retain3}, #{entity.retain4}, #{entity.retain5}, #{entity.retain6}, #{entity.retain7}, #{entity.retain8}, #{entity.retain9}, #{entity.retain10})

on duplicate key update dev_id = values(dev_id), branch_id = values(branch_id), branch_name = values(branch_name), ip = values(ip), visit_time = values(visit_time), create_time = values(create_time), retain1 = values(retain1), retain2 = values(retain2), retain3 = values(retain3), retain4 = values(retain4), retain5 = values(retain5), retain6 = values(retain6), retain7 = values(retain7), retain8 = values(retain8), retain9 = values(retain9), retain10 = values(retain10)

update device_info
dev_id = #{devId},
